name: Vegan Spiced Apple Cake with Salted Caramel
description: Vegan Spiced Apple Cake with Salted Caramel. Tried tested and loved. All whole grain made with spelt flour and drizzeld with salted caramel or date caramel. Makes 1 8 inch cake pan

video.name: SPICED APPLE CAKE | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Easy Spiced Apple Cake! Whole Grain & Delicious 
RECIPE üçéüç∞‚û° https://www.veganricha.com/2013/04/spiced-apple-cake-vegan-recipe.html

Serve this Spiced Apple Cake with Vegan Salted Caramel and Whipped Coconut cream or Ice cream! Tried tested and loved. All whole grain made with Spelt flour and drizzled with salted caramel or date caramel. Makes One 8 inch cake pan.


**Recipes like these in my BOOK, Shipping Worldwide now!!: http://www.veganricha.com/vrekaz **

Music: Joakim Karud- Shine

recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon vinegar (I used apple cider vinegar)
1 cup Spelt flour (, or use wheat flour (pastry flour preferable))
a generous pinch of cardamom powder (optional)
1  Large Ripe apple chopped small (1/4 - 1/2 inch)
Variations: Add chopped up walnuts/pecans (some crystallized ginger.)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add warm water and flaxmeal. Mix and let sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add warm water and flaxmeal. Mix and let sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sugar, oil, coconut milk and whisk until sugar is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sugar, oil, coconut milk and whisk until sugar is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients - spelt, baking powder, baking soda, salt, spices.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients - spelt, baking powder, baking soda, salt, spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dry to the wet and mix until well combined into a smooth batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dry to the wet and mix until well combined into a smooth batter.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add chopped apples and maple syrup. Mix well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add chopped apples and maple syrup. Mix well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the apples into the batter. Fold to distribute well.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the apples into the batter. Fold to distribute well.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop batter into parchment lined or well greased 8 inch cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop batter into parchment lined or well greased 8 inch cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in pre-heated 365 degrees F / 180¬∫c for 40-45 minutes or until toothpick from the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in pre-heated 365 degrees F / 180¬∫c for 40-45 minutes or until toothpick from the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle some salted caramel, or a dollop of whipped coconut cream or use cream cheese frosting.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle some salted caramel, or a dollop of whipped coconut cream or use cream cheese frosting.
